articles.title: About Your Mavens
articles.description: Roles, office hours, backgrounds, and more.
articles.contents:

Site Administrators
In charge of routine site upkeep/content moderation.
Derek Holliday - R Maven
Office hours:
Tues/Thurs 1-3:30PM (in-person Bunche 4337)
Wed 10AM-12PM (Virtual, email for zoom link)
Contact: deholliday at ucla dot edu
Ciara Sterbenz - Math Maven
Office hours:
Mon 10:30AM-2PM
Tues 9AM-12:30PM
Contact: cster at ucla dot edu
